text: This documentation will show you how to use Aurora and it's browser extension

questions.question: What is Aurora?
questions.answer: Aurora is an API created in Java to control your PiHole

questions.question: Why to choose Aurora?
questions.answer: Because Aurora is very reliable and secure, since it is written i Java and uses Spring to create mappings, and Spring Security so secure all the requests

questions.question: Is Aurora safe?
questions.answer: Yes aurora is safe since it uses Spring Security and every request has to authenticated. Although i don't recomend it, it is possible to open the port to the internet if you use PiHole as a remote DNS servers
